overview: Rightly titled ‘More than ‘just’ a teacher’, it is a film that encapsulates several aspects of the National Award Winning educator’s life both within and outside of the ambit of her profession. Revealing her eccentricities and remarkabilities alike, the film is an unusual, yet heartwarming portrait created in a fluttering montage of perspectives. FEATURING EXCLUSIVELY ON CINEMAPRENEUR
title: Mrs. Nambiar
